participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: creative, passionate about music, and optimistic about his dreams.
participant_1.background: i have a children and a dogs. i own a house in florida. i enjoy american sports. i am a male.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: ambitious, a bit introverted, and determined to succeed in her musical career.
participant_2.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents are not very supportive of my dream.

content.text: Hello. I am an amateur musician, and my favorite type of music is folk music.
hello, I am in florida. I own my own house. what do you do?
I am a musician and play guitar in bars on Fridays and sing folk music for my listeners.
that sounds like a lot of fun. I play american sports
I play in a american house. do you have any hobbies? I like sports
Yes, apart from music I like playing football and table tennis. My parents are not very supportive about my musician career, if my dream ever will not come true, may be I will be a footballer.
that sounds fun. do you like american sports? I do, and I like it
